name: Run Trexy!
description:
In this little casual game you need to save a little dinosaur, Trexy (yeah so original...) from certain death. The world is ending, being hit by thousands of meteorites and the extinction of all dinosaurs is near how long can you survive?

Dodge all the meteorites and try to survive as long as possible and to break my record!

Controls:

  • Move: W/A or LeftArrow/RightArrow

-------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first project ever, I took advantage of this period of quarantine to learn something that I was always passionate about, videogames!

I always wanted to learn to make a game from scratch and since in this month I had more free time than ever I took the opportunity to learn unity, I am in love with this world and thanks to the hundreds of tutorial online I am always learning something new.

I am still at the beginning and I have a lot of things that I need to learn to become a decent game developer but I am really excited about this!

After following some tutorials I decided to create this game, the very first project without a tutorial in the background and I must say it wasn't easy, I got stuck so many times, even on little things but I am really happy to say that I finished a game, even if is a really simple one.

So here it is, enjoy and leave some feedback, I appreciate it a lot!
